name: CENTURION® Vision System with OZil IP & Active Fluidics™ Technology
about: CENTURION® Vision System with OZil IP & Active Fluidics™ Technology from Alcon, USA is the cutting edge technology for No Injection, No Stitch, No Bandage, No Blood, No Pain, Phaco cataract surgery with foldable IOL implantation.

name: VuPad Ophthalmic Ultrasound - Sonomed Escalon, USA
about: Ultrasound Biomicroscopy (UBM) with the help of VuPad Ophthalmic Ultrasound from Sonomed Escalon, USA is used for the early diagnosis of angle closure glaucoma and other eye diseases. Ultrasound B-Scan is used for the diagnosis of vitreoretinal diseases.

name: Ophthalmic Operating Microscope OPMI Lumera 700 - Carl Zeiss, Germany
about: Most modern and high end ophthalmic operating microscope OPMI Lumera 700 from Carl Zeiss, Germany is used to perform all eye microsurgeries. Operations are shown live with the help of 3 chip HD camera directly from the operation theater, which are being recorded and attendants are being communicated with the help of audio-visual system.

name: VISUCAM 500 - Carl Zeiss, Germany
about: VISUCAM 500 from Carl Zeiss, Germany is used for Color Fundus Imaging and Fundus Fluorescein Angiography, which is essential for the diagnosis of various vitreoretinal diseases. Optic Disc Imaging is done for the early detection of glaucoma.

name: Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) from Carl Zeiss, Germany is very essential for the early diagnosis of glaucoma and various retinal diseases.
OPD Scan - Nidek, Japan
about: OPD Scan from Nidek, Japan is used for Corneal Topography, Wavefront Analysis, Auto Refraction and Auto Keratometry.

name: OcuScan® RxP - Alcon, USA
about: OcuScan® RxP Alcon USA is used to determine the IOL (Lens) power prior to Phacoemulsification and to measure the corneal thickness prior to LASIK.

name: Bio-Meter AL 100 - Tomey, Japan
about: Bio-Meter AL-100 Tomey is used to measure the Intraocular lens power calculation before cataract surgery.

name: Ophthalmic YAG Laser System YC 1800 - Nidek, Japan
about: Ophthalmic YAG Laser System YC-1800 from Nidek, Japan is used for post cataract posterior capsular opacity management and for the treatment of angle closure glaucoma.

name: Green Laser VISULAS 532s - Carl Zeiss, Germany
about: Green Laser VISULAS 532s from Carl Zeiss, Germany is used to stop the bleeding inside the eye in the treatment of diabetic retinopathy, different retinal vascular diseases and age related macular degeneration.

name: Humphrey Visual Field Analyzer - Carl Zeiss, Germany
about: Visual Field Analysis by Humphrey Field Analyzer from Carl Zeiss, Germany is used for the early diagnosis of glaucoma & other ophthalmic neurological diseases.

name: Noncontact Tonometer with Pachymeter NT 530p - Nidek, Japan
about: Noncontact Tonometer with Pachymeter, NT 530p from Nidek, Japan is used to measure the eye pressure & corneal thickness without touching the eye. Both are important for glaucoma diagnosis and management.

name: PENTACAM AXL + CORVIS ST
about: PENTACAM AXL + CORVIS ST Precise KERATOCONUS, LASIK, SMILE, CATARACT & GLAUCOMA Evaluation.

name: Slit Lamp BQ 900 Imaging Solutions - HAAG-STREIT, UK
about: Slit Lamp BQ 900 Imaging Solutions, NT 530p from Nidek, Japan is used to measure the eye pressure & corneal thickness without touching the eye. Both are important for glaucoma diagnosis and management.

name: CALLISTO Eye - Carl Zeiss, Germany
about: Computer assisted cataract surgery with CALLISTO® eye from ZEISS makes precise, premium IOL alignment fast and easy! It helps you meet patient expectations with assistance functions projected directly into your surgical field. Document and display your results in HD photo and video and manage them in a central place with ZEISS FORUM Eye Care Data Management.
